scripts.start: PORT=3001 MIC_NAME=hw MID_DEVICE=Mic CARD=0 MIC_CHANNELS=2 node app.js
scripts.start-usb: PORT=3001 MIN_RATE=10 MAX_RATE=50 BT=500 MIC_NAME=hw CARD=2 MID_DEVICE=Mic MIC_CHANNELS=1 node app.js
scripts.start-raspi: PORT=3001 MIN_RATE=10 MAX_RATE=50 BT=500 MIC_NAME=hw MID_DEVICE=Mic CARD=1 MIC_CHANNELS=1 node app.js
scripts.autorun: export PORT=3001 MIC_NAME=hw  MID_DEVICE=Mic CARD=1 MIC_CHANNELS=1 MIN_RATE=10 MAX_RATE=50 BT=300 && pm2 start app.js --name 'RLN-detector'
